title: Type ID - Wedding Invite - All Caps
author: thompson

comments.content:
Can you include an image for us to look at?

(edit: aah! thanks)

- Mike Yanega

Has a feeling somewhat like Rian Hughes' [Yolanda](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516210043/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/device/yolanda/), but definitely not that font.

- Mike Yanega
Looks like something T-26 or youworkforthem would sell... I need to poke around there some more.

Similar feel to [Twigglee](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516210043/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/twigglee/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D118%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DBARBARA%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D27)

Also [Astoria Antique SG Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516210043/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/astoria-antique/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D118%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DBARBARA%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D38)
wow. Astoria is soooo close. Good call.
